title: Fate of a Man | WAR MOVIE

sources.title: Fate of a Man | WAR MOVIE
sources.description:
Based on the story by M. Sholokhov. The film tells about the fate of the Russian soldier Andrei Sokolov, who experienced all the hardships of war and captivity. He had lost his family, but retained honor and dignity, a kind, sympathetic heart that is capable of sincere love.

IMDb rating: 8,0

Year of production: 1959

Director: Bondarchuk Sergey
Writers: Yury Lukin, Fedor Shakhmagonov
Composer: Basner Veniamin
Operator: Monakhov Vladimir
Production designers: Sergey Voronkov, Ippolit Novoderezhkin

Cast: Borisov Lev, Kiriyenko Zinaida, Teterin Evgeny, Bondarchuk Sergey, Novikov Alexander, Averin Yuri, Volkov Pavel, Vinnikov Pavel, Markin Viktor, Boriskin (Polunin) Pavel, Chemodurov Anatoly, Aparin Nikolai, Kuznetsov Alexander, Alekseev Konstantin, Melnikova Evgenia , Savin Petr, Kudryashev Evgeny, Shapovalov Georgy
